skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Well don't gawk at it, dreng it!

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
It is a Rik's duty to lead his fellow Dawi into battle.
Never pass up an opportunity to relieve a Grobi head from its filthy body.
You'll need some Bugman's after this.
Perhaps one day you'll win.
Get a move on!
Only the most foolish would dare stand against you.
Few have ever cultivated such a spectacular beard.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Even a Dawi who lives and breathes war will honor the goddess of Home and Hearth.
Now then, what's all this complainin'? There'll be none of that in my throng!

effects.description:
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: I have the eyes of a hawk and the ears of a fox.
The beard always knows.

effects.description:
Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

Ambush defence chance: +3%
	(own armies in province)

Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

Ambush defence chance: +6%
	(own armies in province)

Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: There'll be no drinkin' nor feastin' till every last bit of gal is accounted for!
One bound by an oath to defend fights all the harder, gladly giving his life rather than face the dishonour of failure.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Hammerers units
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Deep-tunnel warfare requires one to become comfortable standing closer to explosions than is perhaps sensible.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Flammable!" that lowers movement speed and adds weakness to fire

Ammunition: +50% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes, Ironbreakers and Miners units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Long periods spent tracking foes far from the safety of the Holds makes experts at approaching enemies from unexpected angles.

effects.description:
Attribute: Snipe for Rangers units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: What was yours is mine now.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.
This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even in the time of the Ancestor Gods, Gazul pondered long on the mortality of his race.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Morgrim was the first Dwarf Engineer. He developed and taught his clans the techniques of crafting engines of war and other devices.
Smednir is a Dwarf deity of some importance, because of his patronage of metalworking and the refining of ore.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The younger son of Grungni and Valaya, Thungni is the god of Runic magic and runesmithing.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +25%
	(own characters in region)

Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Greenskins don't deserve to live longer than a fly.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Skaven will die for our brothers lost in the deep tunnels!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Skaven
	(armies in local owned region)
